sbe:messageSchema.description: B3 Market Data UMDF SBE messages

composite.name: messageHeader
composite.description: Message identifiers and length of message root

type.name: numInGroup
type.description: A counter representing the number of entries in a repeating group.

type.name: sequenceVersion
type.description: Sequence version (incremented weekly or when market data engine failover happens)

type.name: sequenceNumber
type.description: Packet sequence number (reset to 1 when sequenceVersion increments)

type.name: sendingTime
type.description: Sending Time as number of nanoseconds since epoch (1970-01-01 00:00:00 UTC)

enum.name: MessageType
enum.description: FIX Message Type

type.name: Int8
type.description: 1-byte signed integer, from -128 to 127; if optional, null value is -128

type.name: Int16
type.description: 2-byte signed integer, from -32768 to 32767; if optional, null value is -32768

type.name: Int32
type.description: 4-byte signed integer, from -2147483648 to 2147483647; if optional, null value is -2147483648

type.name: Int8NULL
type.description: 1-byte signed integer, from -128 to 127, NULL (optional) value = 0

type.name: Int16NULL
type.description: 2-byte unsigned integer, from -32768 to 32767, NULL (optional) value = 0

type.name: Int32NULL
type.description: 4-byte signed integer, from -2147483648 (-2^31) to 2147483647 (2^31-1), NULL (optional) value = 0

type.name: UInt8NULL
type.description: 1-byte unsigned integer, from 1 to 255, NULL (optional) value = 0

type.name: UInt16NULL
type.description: 2-byte unsigned integer, from 1 to 65535, NULL (optional) value = 0

type.name: UInt32NULL
type.description: 4-byte unsigned integer, from 1 to 4294967295 (2^32-1), NULL (optional) value = 0

type.name: UInt64NULL
type.description: 8-byte unsigned integer, from 1 to 18446744073709551615 (2^64-1), NULL (optional) value = 0

enum.name: TimeUnit
enum.description: Unit of time

enum.name: Boolean
enum.description: Boolean type

composite.name: Price
composite.description: Price (4 decimal places). Usually 3 places are enough, but FX requires 4

composite.name: PriceOptional
composite.description: Optional Price (4 decimal places). Usually 3 places are enough, but FX requires 4

composite.name: PriceOffset
composite.description: Price Offset (4 decimal places). Usually 3 places are enough, but FX requires 4

composite.name: PriceOffsetOptional
composite.description: Price Offset (4 decimal places). Usually 3 places are enough, but FX requires 4

composite.name: RatioQty
composite.description: Ratio of quantity relative to the whole thing

type.name: QuantityOptional
type.description: Optional Quantity in order/trade, null value = 0

composite.name: UTCTimestampNanos
composite.description: UTC timestamp with nanosecond precision (Unix Epoch)

type.name: time
type.description: UTC timestamp with nanosecond precision (Unix Epoch)

type.name: LocalMktDate
type.description: Local date (as opposed to UTC). Number of days since UNIX Epoch (January 1st, 1970). Example: 18319 represents February 27, 2020.

type.name: Currency
type.description: 3-letter alphabetic ISO Currency Codes (ISO 4217). Example: BRL, USD.

type.name: SeqNum
type.description: Sequence number inside the given channel

type.name: SecurityID
type.description: Security ID as defined by B3's Trading System

enum.name: Side
enum.description: Side of order

enum.name: SecurityUpdateAction
enum.description: Action used when updating the security

enum.name: LotType
enum.description: Describes the lot type for the instruments. Used for the Equities segment.

enum.name: Product
enum.description: Indicates the type of product the security is associated with

enum.name: SecurityType
enum.description: Indicates the type of the security

enum.name: SecuritySubType
enum.description: The subtype of the instrument

validValue.name: EXCHANGE_DEFINED_SPREAD
validValue.description: Exchange defined spread (not currently in use)

validValue.name: NON_TRADABLE_INDEX_REAL_ESTATE_ETF
validValue.description: Non-tradable Index in Real Estate ETF

type.name: SecurityStrategyType
type.description: Strategy type definition. Required for strategy instruments.

type.name: Asset
type.description: Asset associated with the security, such as DOL, BGI, OZ1, WDL, CNI, etc.

enum.name: ExerciseStyle
enum.description: Type of exercise of a derivatives security

enum.name: PutOrCall
enum.description: Indicates whether an option contract is a put or call.

type.name: SettlType
type.description: Indicates order settlement period in days. (e.g. 0, D1, D2, D3, D60, D120 etc.) If present, SettlDate (64) overrides this field.

type.name: CFICode
type.description: Classification of Financial Instruments (CFI code) values, which indicate the type of security using the ISO 10962 standard.

enum.name: PriceType
enum.description: Code to represent the price type. If absent, the instrument trades in decimals.

validValue.name: PU
validValue.description: Per unit (i.e., per share or contract)

enum.name: SecurityTradingStatus
enum.description: Status related to a given Instrument or phase related to a SecurityGroup where the instrument belongs to.

enum.name: TradingSessionSubID
enum.description: Status related to a given Instrument or phase related to a SecurityGroup where the instrument belongs to.

enum.name: GovernanceIndicator
enum.description: Corporative governance level indicator. Required for cash equities.

type.name: SecurityGroup
type.description: Indicates the group this instrument belongs to.

enum.name: SecurityMatchType
enum.description: Type of matching that occurred. Required for Special Auctions.

enum.name: AggressorSide
enum.description: Which side is aggressor of this trade.

type.name: MDEntryPositionNo
type.description: Display position of a bid or offer, numbered from most competitive to least competitive, per market side, beginning with 1.

set.name: TradeCondition
set.description: Set of conditions describing a trade/imbalance.

type.name: MarketSegmentID
type.description: Identifies the market segment. Required for all tradable instruments. Not present in equity indexes, ETF indexes, BTB and Option Exercise

enum.name: TradingSessionID
enum.description: Phase related to a SecurityGroup where the instrument belongs to.

enum.name: MDStreamID
enum.description: The identifier or name of market data stream.

enum.name: SecurityTradingEvent
enum.description: Identifies an event related to a Trade. This tag is also used to mark when an instrument state is kept separate from the group phase, or when the instrument state follows the default group phase (stops having a separate, defined state).

validValue.name: SECURITY_STATUS_CHANGE
validValue.description: Security Status maintained separately from Group Status

enum.name: PriceBandType
enum.description: Indicates the type of price banding (tunnel). Used for Price Banding when tags LowLimitPrice and HighLimitPrice are sent

enum.name: OpenCloseSettlFlag
enum.description: Identifies if the opening/closing price in field MDEntryPx represents a theoretical opening/closing price and applicable to describe when the settlement data is related to.

enum.name: PriceLimitType
enum.description: Describes how the price limits are expressed. The default value is “0” (Price Unit).

enum.name: PriceBandMidpointPriceType
enum.description: Band Midpoint Type, used with Auction Price Banding.

enum.name: PriceAdjustmentMethod
enum.description: Indicator of previous day's closing price. Used for Closing price adjustments related to Corporate Actions.

validValue.name: THEORETICAL_PRICE_EX_SHARE_WHEN_GREATER_WITH
validValue.description: Theoretical price of EX share when greater than WITH price

validValue.name: THEORETICAL_PRICE_EX_SHARE_RESULTING_DIVIDENDS
validValue.description: Theoretical price of EX share, resulting from dividends in different types of stocks/companies.

enum.name: SettlPriceType
enum.description: Type of settlement price

enum.name: UnderlyingPxType
enum.description: Indicates the Underlying Instrument price type reflected in Index value. Used for Composite Underlying Price.

enum.name: MDUpdateAction
enum.description: Types of Market Data update action.

enum.name: MDEntryType
enum.description: Type of the Market Data Entry.

validValue.name: TRADE
validValue.description: Trade or Trade Summary or Last Trade Price

type.name: length
type.description: Length of a string, in bytes. For instance, the string 'Ação', converted to UTF-8, has 6 bytes, so length = 6.

type.name: varData
type.description: Bytes of the string, encoded in UTF-8.

enum.name: NewsSource
enum.description: Source for the news

enum.name: ApplVerID
enum.description: Specifies the service pack release being applied at message level

enum.name: MultiLegModel
enum.description: Specifies the type of multileg order. Defines whether the security is pre-defined or user-defined.

enum.name: MultiLegPriceMethod
enum.description: Code to represent how the multileg price is to be interpreted when applied to the legs.

enum.name: InstrAttribType
enum.description: Code to represent the type of instrument attributes.

validValue.name: TRADE_TYPE_ELIGIBILITY
validValue.description: Trade type eligibility details for security.

enum.name: InstrAttribValue
enum.description: Code to represent the type of instrument attributes.

validValue.name: ELECTRONIC_MATCH_OR_GTD_GTC_ELIGIBLE
validValue.description: Electronic Match Eligible (871=24) or GTD/GTC Eligible (871=34)

set.name: MatchEventIndicator
set.description: Set of indicators for the end of updates for a given event. It also indicates if this message is a retransmission.

choice.name: LastTradeMsg
choice.description: (Reserved) 1=Last trade message for the event, 0=Not last

sbe:message.name: SequenceReset_1
sbe:message.description: Used to reset the incremental stream or indicate the loop on instrument definition or snapshot recovery is restarting

field.name: applVerID
field.description: Specifies the service pack release being applied at message level

field.name: newSeqNo
field.description: New sequence number. Always one.

sbe:message.name: Sequence_2
sbe:message.description: Sent in incremental, snapshot and instrument list feeds in periods of no activity.

field.name: applVerID
field.description: Specifies the service pack release being applied at message level

field.name: nextSeqNo
field.description: The next application sequence number in the feed. Always 1 (one) for snapshot replay and instrument replay feeds

sbe:message.name: SecurityStatus_3
sbe:message.description: Trading status for instruments and groups

field.name: applVerID
field.description: Specifies the service pack release being applied at message level

field.name: securityID
field.description: Security ID as defined by B3. For the SecurityID list, see the Security Definition message in Market Data feed.

field.name: securityIDSource
field.description: Security ID Source

field.name: securityExchange
field.description: Market to which the symbol belongs

field.name: securityGroup
field.description: Security Group

field.name: securityTradingEvent
field.description: Identifies an event related to a Trading. This tag is also used to mark when an instrument state is kept separate from the group phase, or when the instrument state follows the default group phase (stops having a separate, defined state). Always sent when tag 48 is present.

field.name: tradeDate
field.description: Used to specify the trading date for which a set of market data applies. If absent, use the current day (expressed in local time at place of trade)

field.name: tradingSessionSubID
field.description: Phase related to a given SecurityGroup

field.name: securityTradingStatus
field.description: Status related to a given instrument

field.name: transactTime
field.description: Timestamp when the business transaction represented by the message occurred

field.name: tradSesOpenTime
field.description: Estimated end of the current auction. Included only if SecurityTradingStatus=21 (Reserved)

field.name: tradingSessionID
field.description: Identifier for trading session

field.name: mDStreamID
field.description: The identifier or name of market data stream.

field.name: matchEventIndicator
field.description: Identifies the end of the current event and if it is a retransmission

sbe:message.name: SecurityDefinition_4
sbe:message.description: Security Definition

field.name: applVerID
field.description: Specifies the service pack release being applied at message level

field.name: securityID
field.description: Security ID as defined by B3

field.name: securityExchange
field.description: Exchange Code

field.name: securityIDSource
field.description: Security ID Source

field.name: securityGroup
field.description: Security Group

field.name: totNumReports
field.description: Total number of instruments to be returned in a replay loop

field.name: symbol
field.description: Instrument's ticker symbol

field.name: securityUpdateAction
field.description: Action used when updating the security

field.name: securityType
field.description: Instrument's security type

field.name: securitySubType
field.description: Instrument's security sub type

field.name: totNoRelatedSym
field.description: Total number of securities being returned for this request.

field.name: minPriceIncrement
field.description: Number of minimum price increments

field.name: strikePrice
field.description: Strike price of an option

field.name: contractMultiplier
field.description: Specifies the ratio or multiply factor to convert from “nominal” units (e.g. contracts) to total units (e.g. shares) (e.g. 1.0, 100, 1000, 0.00025 etc).

field.name: priceDivisor
field.description: Value that divides the Price field to produce the actual order price (based on Step of Quotation). (e.g. 1, 100, 1000, etc). Default value is 1. Also used for index instruments to disseminate the index reducer, in this case, there is no default value.

field.name: issueDate
field.description: The date on which the security is issued/activated.

field.name: securityValidityTimestamp
field.description: Indicates the UTC timestamp when trading for this security expires, i.e. when it is not eligible to trade anymore. Different from MaturityDate.

field.name: noSharesIssued
field.description: Share capital

field.name: clearingHouseID
field.description: Clearing House ID

field.name: minOrderQty
field.description: Minimum quantity for an order

field.name: maxOrderQty
field.description: Maximum quantity for an order

field.name: corporateActionEventId
field.description: Corporate Action Event ID

field.name: minLotSize
field.description: Minimum lot size allowed based on lot type specified in LotType(1093). Used for the equities segment.

field.name: minTradeVol
field.description: The minimum trading volume for the security.

field.name: maturityDate
field.description: Date of instrument maturity

field.name: countryOfIssue
field.description: ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 country code

field.name: startDate
field.description: Start date of a financing deal, i.e. the date the buyer pays the seller cash and takes control of the collateral

field.name: endDate
field.description: End date of a financing deal, i.e. the date the seller reimburses the buyer and takes back control of the collateral.

field.name: settlType
field.description: Order settlement period in days

field.name: settlDate
field.description: Specific date of trade settlement

field.name: datedDate
field.description: The date of the security activation, if different from the IssueDate.

field.name: isinNumber
field.description: ISIN Number

field.name: asset
field.description: Asset associated to the security

field.name: cfiCode
field.description: Classification of Financial Instruments (CFI code) values, which indicate the type of security using the ISO 10962 standard.

field.name: maturityMonthYear
field.description: Month and year of the maturity

field.name: contractSettlMonth
field.description: Specifies when the contract will settle.

field.name: currency
field.description: Currency code

field.name: strikeCurrency
field.description: Currency of option's strike price

field.name: settlCurrency
field.description: Currency used for the settlement

field.name: securityStrategyType
field.description: Strategy type definition

field.name: lotType
field.description: Lot type

field.name: tickSizeDenominator
field.description: Number of decimals for pricing the instrument

field.name: product
field.description: Type of product

field.name: exerciseStyle
field.description: Exercise Style

field.name: putOrCall
field.description: Indicates whether an option contract is a put or call.

field.name: priceType
field.description: Price type of the instrument

field.name: marketSegmentID
field.description: Market segment

field.name: governanceIndicator
field.description: Corporative Governance Level Indicator

field.name: securityMatchType
field.description: Type of matching that occurred

field.name: lastFragment
field.description: Indicates whether this message is the last in the sequence of messages.

field.name: multiLegModel
field.description: Defines whether the security is pre-defined or user-defined. Used for multileg security only.

field.name: multiLegPriceMethod
field.description: Defines the method used when applying the multileg price to the legs. When this tag is set, it indicates spreads that have leg prices generated by the trading engine.

field.name: underlyingSecurityID
field.description: Underlying instrument's security ID

field.name: underlyingSecurityIDSource
field.description: Underlying instrument's Security ID Source

field.name: underlyingSecurityExchange
field.description: Underlying instrument's Exchange Code

field.name: indexPct
field.description: Required if this is an equity index instrument. Indicates the percentage that this underlying composes the index.

field.name: indexTheoreticalQty
field.description: The theoretical quantity of this underlying composing the index. This tag is only used for index instruments.

field.name: underlyingSymbol
field.description: Underlying instrument's ticker symbol

field.name: legSecurityID
field.description: Leg's security ID

field.name: legSecurityIDSource
field.description: Leg's Security ID Source

field.name: legSecurityExchange
field.description: Leg's Exchange Code

field.name: legRatioQty
field.description: Ratio of quantity for this leg relative to the entire security

field.name: legSecurityType
field.description: Leg's security type

field.name: legSide
field.description: Side of this leg

field.name: legSymbol
field.description: Leg symbol

group.name: noInstrAttribs
group.description: Specifies the number of the application ID occurrences (number of channels).

field.name: instrAttribType
field.description: Code to represent the type of instrument attributes.

field.name: instrAttribValue
field.description: Attribute value appropriate to the InstrAttribType (871) field.

data.name: securityDesc
data.description: Non-normative textual description for the financial instrument

sbe:message.name: News_5
sbe:message.description: Conveys market information of B3 market surveillance notifications and news produced by agencies.

field.name: applVerID
field.description: Specifies the service pack release being applied at message level

field.name: origTime
field.description: Time of message origination

field.name: securityID
field.description: Security ID as defined by B3. For the SecurityID list, see the Security Definition message in Market Data feed.

field.name: securityIDSource
field.description: Security ID Source

field.name: securityExchange
field.description: Market to which the symbol belongs

field.name: newsID
field.description: Unique identifier for News message. Included in the News messages sent in the Unified News Channel. Not sent for trading engine News messages.

field.name: totalTextLength
field.description: Total size, in bytes, for the text of a News message.

field.name: languageCode
field.description: Indicates the language the news is in. If absent, 'pt' = Portuguese

field.name: partCount
field.description: Total number of parts for the text of a News message. Usually 1.

field.name: partNumber
field.description: Number of the part for this message. Starts from 1.

field.name: newsSource
field.description: Source of the News

data.name: headline
data.description: The headline of a News message.

data.name: uRLLink
data.description: A URL (Uniform Resource Locator) link to additional information (e.g. http://www.b3.com.br)

sbe:message.name: IncrementalRefresh_EmptyBook_9
sbe:message.description: Market Data Incremental Refresh - Empty Book

field.name: applVerID
field.description: Specifies the service pack release being applied at message level

field.name: securityID
field.description: Security ID as defined by B3. For the SecurityID list, see the Security Definition message in Market Data feed.

field.name: securityIDSource
field.description: Security ID Source

field.name: securityExchange
field.description: Market to which the symbol belongs

field.name: matchEventIndicator
field.description: Identifies the end of the current event and if it is a retransmission

sbe:message.name: IncrementalRefresh_OpeningPrice_15
sbe:message.description: Carries the summary information about opening trading session events per market data stream.

field.name: applVerID
field.description: Specifies the service pack release being applied at message level

field.name: mDEntryType
field.description: Entry type: Opening Price

field.name: securityID
field.description: Security ID as defined by B3. For the SecurityID list, see the Security Definition message in Market Data feed.

field.name: securityIDSource
field.description: Security ID Source

field.name: securityExchange
field.description: Market to which the symbol belongs

field.name: mDEntryTimestamp
field.description: Date and Time of Market Data Entry

field.name: mDEntryPx
field.description: Value of the statistics

field.name: netChgPrevDay
field.description: Net change from previous trading day’s closing price vs. last traded price.

field.name: tradeDate
field.description: Used to specify the trading date for which a set of market data applies. If absent, use the current day (expressed in local time at place of trade)

field.name: mDUpdateAction
field.description: Update Action (NEW or DELETE)

field.name: mDStreamID
field.description: The identifier or name of market data stream.

field.name: openCloseSettlFlag
field.description: Identifies if the opening price in field MDEntryPx represents a theoretical opening price and applicable to describe when the settlement data is related to.

field.name: matchEventIndicator
field.description: Identifies the end of the current event and if it is a retransmission

sbe:message.name: IncrementalRefresh_TheoreticalOpeningPrice_16
sbe:message.description: The theoretical opening price is also sent on this block and is calculated and updated based on the orders presented in the book during every auction including the pre-opening / pre-closing auction.

field.name: applVerID
field.description: Specifies the service pack release being applied at message level

field.name: mDEntryType
field.description: Entry type: Opening Price

field.name: securityID
field.description: Security ID as defined by B3. For the SecurityID list, see the Security Definition message in Market Data feed.

field.name: securityIDSource
field.description: Security ID Source

field.name: securityExchange
field.description: Market to which the symbol belongs

field.name: mDEntryTimestamp
field.description: Date and Time of Market Data Entry

field.name: mDEntryPx
field.description: Theoretical Opening Price

field.name: mDEntrySize
field.description: Theoretical Opening Quantity

field.name: tradeDate
field.description: Used to specify the trading date for which a set of market data applies. If absent, use the current day (expressed in local time at place of trade)

field.name: mDUpdateAction
field.description: Update Action (NEW or DELETE)

field.name: openCloseSettlFlag
field.description: Indicates this is a theoretical opening price

field.name: mDStreamID
field.description: The identifier or name of market data stream.

field.name: matchEventIndicator
field.description: Identifies the end of the current event and if it is a retransmission

sbe:message.name: IncrementalRefresh_ClosingPrice_17
sbe:message.description: Summary information about closing trading sessions per market data stream

field.name: applVerID
field.description: Specifies the service pack release being applied at message level

field.name: mDEntryType
field.description: Entry type: Closing Price

field.name: mDUpdateAction
field.description: Update Action (NEW) - always replace

field.name: securityID
field.description: Security ID as defined by B3. For the SecurityID list, see the Security Definition message in Market Data feed.

field.name: securityIDSource
field.description: Security ID Source

field.name: securityExchange
field.description: Market to which the symbol belongs

field.name: mDEntryTimestamp
field.description: Date and Time of Market Data Entry

field.name: mDEntryPx
field.description: Closing price

field.name: netChgPrevDay
field.description: Net change from previous trading day’s closing price vs. last traded price.

field.name: lastTradeDate
field.description: Date the instrument last traded.

field.name: tradeDate
field.description: Used to specify the trading date for which a set of market data applies. If absent, use the current day (expressed in local time at place of trade)

field.name: priceAdjustmentMethod
field.description: Indicator of previous day's closing price. Used for Closing price adjustments related to Corporate Actions.

field.name: openCloseSettlFlag
field.description: Describe when the settlement data is related to; valid values: 0, 3 or 4

field.name: mDStreamID
field.description: The identifier or name of market data stream.

field.name: matchEventIndicator
field.description: Identifies the end of the current event and if it is a retransmission

sbe:message.name: IncrementalRefresh_AuctionImbalance_19
sbe:message.description: Carries auction imbalance information, indicating the remaining quantity and to which side (buyer or seller) the auction is pending towards.

field.name: applVerID
field.description: Specifies the service pack release being applied at message level

field.name: mDEntryType
field.description: Entry type: Imbalance

field.name: securityID
field.description: Security ID as defined by B3. For the SecurityID list, see the Security Definition message in Market Data feed.

field.name: securityIDSource
field.description: Security ID Source

field.name: securityExchange
field.description: Market to which the symbol belongs

field.name: mDEntryTimestamp
field.description: Date and Time of Market Data Entry

field.name: mDEntrySize
field.description: Remaining auction quantity

field.name: tradeCondition
field.description: IMBALANCE_MORE_BUYERS or IMBALANCE_MORE_SELLERS

field.name: mDUpdateAction
field.description: Update Action (NEW or DELETE)

field.name: matchEventIndicator
field.description: Identifies the end of the current event and if it is a retransmission

sbe:message.name: IncrementalRefresh_PriceBand_20
sbe:message.description: Carries auction imbalance information, indicating the remaining quantity and to which side (buyer or seller) the auction is pending towards.

field.name: applVerID
field.description: Specifies the service pack release being applied at message level

field.name: mDEntryType
field.description: Entry type: Price Band

field.name: mDUpdateAction
field.description: Update Action (NEW) - always replace

field.name: securityID
field.description: Security ID as defined by B3. For the SecurityID list, see the Security Definition message in Market Data feed.

field.name: securityIDSource
field.description: Security ID Source

field.name: securityExchange
field.description: Market to which the symbol belongs

field.name: mDEntryTimestamp
field.description: Date and Time of Market Data Entry

field.name: lowLimitPrice
field.description: Allowable low limit price for the trading day. A key parameter in validating order price. Used as the lower band for validating order prices. Orders submitted with prices below the lower limit will be rejected.

field.name: highLimitPrice
field.description: Allowable high limit price for the trading day. A key parameter in validating order price. Used as the upper band for validating order prices. Orders submitted with prices above the upper limit will be rejected.

field.name: tradingReferencePrice
field.description: Reference price for the current trading price range. The value may be the reference price, settlement price or closing price of the prior trading day. Sent only for Economic Indicators

field.name: priceBandType
field.description: Not sent for reference price limits

field.name: priceLimitType
field.description: Describes how the price limits are expressed. The default value is 'Price Unit'.

field.name: priceBandMidpointPriceType
field.description: Band Midpoint Type, used with Auction Price Banding. Only sent for Rejection and Auction Bands when PriceLimitType (1306) equals to 2 (Percentage)

field.name: matchEventIndicator
field.description: Identifies the end of the current event and if it is a retransmission

sbe:message.name: IncrementalRefresh_QuantityBand_21
sbe:message.description: Carries auction imbalance information, indicating the remaining quantity and to which side (buyer or seller) the auction is pending towards.

field.name: applVerID
field.description: Specifies the service pack release being applied at message level

field.name: mDEntryType
field.description: Entry type: Price Band

field.name: mDUpdateAction
field.description: Update Action (NEW) - always replace

field.name: securityID
field.description: Security ID as defined by B3. For the SecurityID list, see the Security Definition message in Market Data feed.

field.name: securityIDSource
field.description: Security ID Source

field.name: securityExchange
field.description: Market to which the symbol belongs

field.name: mDEntryTimestamp
field.description: Date and Time of Market Data Entry

field.name: avgDailyTradedQty
field.description: Daily average shares traded within 30 days – equity market only. Previously known as DailyAvgShares30D. Always 0 for Derivatives.

field.name: maxTradeVol
field.description: The maximum order quantity that can be submitted for a security. The value is the minimum between % of shares issued and % of average traded quantity within 30 days.

field.name: matchEventIndicator
field.description: Identifies the end of the current event and if it is a retransmission

sbe:message.name: IncrementalRefresh_HighPrice_24
sbe:message.description: The highest price traded for the security in the trading session.

field.name: applVerID
field.description: Specifies the service pack release being applied at message level

field.name: mDEntryType
field.description: Entry type: Trading Session High Price

field.name: securityID
field.description: Security ID as defined by B3. For the SecurityID list, see the Security Definition message in Market Data feed.

field.name: securityIDSource
field.description: Security ID Source

field.name: securityExchange
field.description: Market to which the symbol belongs

field.name: mDEntryTimestamp
field.description: Date and Time of Market Data Entry

field.name: mDEntryPx
field.description: Trading Session High Price

field.name: tradeDate
field.description: Used to specify the trading date for which a set of market data applies. If absent, use the current day (expressed in local time at place of trade)

field.name: mDUpdateAction
field.description: Update Action (NEW or DELETE)

field.name: mDStreamID
field.description: The identifier or name of market data stream.

field.name: matchEventIndicator
field.description: Identifies the end of the current event and if it is a retransmission

sbe:message.name: IncrementalRefresh_LastTradePrice_27
sbe:message.description: The latest price traded for the security in the trading session.

field.name: applVerID
field.description: Specifies the service pack release being applied at message level

field.name: mDEntryType
field.description: Entry type: Last Trade Price

field.name: securityID
field.description: Security ID as defined by B3. For the SecurityID list, see the Security Definition message in Market Data feed.

field.name: securityIDSource
field.description: Security ID Source

field.name: securityExchange
field.description: Market to which the symbol belongs

field.name: mDEntryTimestamp
field.description: Date and Time of Market Data Entry

field.name: mDEntryPx
field.description: Last Trade Price

field.name: tradeVolume
field.description: Total traded volume for the session.

field.name: vwapPx
field.description: Volume-weighted average price

field.name: mDEntryInterestRate
field.description: Interest Rate of the Termo Trade. Expressed in decimal form. For example, 1% points is expressed and sent as 0.01. One basis point is represented as 0.0001.

field.name: netChgPrevDay
field.description: Net change from previous trading day’s closing price vs. last traded price.

field.name: tradeDate
field.description: Used to specify the trading date for which a set of market data applies. If absent, use the current day (expressed in local time at place of trade)

field.name: mDUpdateAction
field.description: Update Action (NEW or DELETE)

field.name: mDStreamID
field.description: The identifier or name of market data stream.

field.name: matchEventIndicator
field.description: Identifies the end of the current event and if it is a retransmission

sbe:message.name: SnapshotFullRefresh_Header_30
sbe:message.description: Header for the snapshot of a single instrument.

field.name: applVerID
field.description: Specifies the service pack release being applied at message level

field.name: securityID
field.description: Security ID as defined by B3. For the SecurityID list, see the Security Definition message in Market Data feed.

field.name: securityIDSource
field.description: Security ID Source

field.name: securityExchange
field.description: Market to which the symbol belongs

field.name: lastMsgSeqNumProcessed
field.description: The last processed packet sequence number of the incremental channel as of the time the snapshot was generated. This value is used to synchronize the snapshot with the incremental feed.

field.name: totNumReports
field.description: Total number of snapshots to be returned in a replay loop

field.name: totNumBids
field.description: Total number of bid orders that constitute this snapshot

field.name: totNumOffers
field.description: Total number of ask orders that constitute this snapshot

field.name: totNumStats
field.description: Total number of statistics (incremental and security status messages) that constitute this snapshot

sbe:message.name: IncrementalRefresh_Order_MBO_50
sbe:message.description: Disseminates the creation or modification of a new order.

field.name: applVerID
field.description: Specifies the service pack release being applied at message level

field.name: securityID
field.description: Security ID as defined by B3. For the SecurityID list, see the Security Definition message in Market Data feed.

field.name: securityIDSource
field.description: Security ID Source

field.name: securityExchange
field.description: Market to which the symbol belongs

field.name: mDEntryTimestamp
field.description: Date and Time of Market Data Entry

field.name: mDInsertTimestamp
field.description: The date and time when the order was inserted or re-inserted into the order book or manually altered by MktOps.

field.name: orderID
field.description: Unique identifier for Order as assigned by the exchange. It is unique per broker firm, per instrument, per trading date.

field.name: mDEntryPositionNo
field.description: Display position of a bid or offer, numbered from most competitive to least competitive, per market side, beginning with 1.

field.name: mDEntrySize
field.description: Displayed quantity or volume represented by the Market Data Entry

field.name: mDEntryPx
field.description: Price per share or contract. Conditionally required if the order type requires a price (not market orders and RLP)

field.name: enteringFirm
field.description: Identifies the broker firm

field.name: mDEntryType
field.description: Entry Type (BID or OFFER)

field.name: mDUpdateAction
field.description: Update Action (NEW, CHANGE)

field.name: mDStreamID
field.description: The identifier or name of market data stream.

field.name: matchEventIndicator
field.description: Identifies if it is a retransmission

sbe:message.name: IncrementalRefresh_DeleteOrder_MBO_51
sbe:message.description: Disseminates the deletion of a new order.

field.name: applVerID
field.description: Specifies the service pack release being applied at message level

field.name: securityID
field.description: Security ID as defined by B3. For the SecurityID list, see the Security Definition message in Market Data feed.

field.name: securityIDSource
field.description: Security ID Source

field.name: securityExchange
field.description: Market to which the symbol belongs

field.name: mDEntryTimestamp
field.description: Date and Time of Market Data Entry

field.name: orderID
field.description: Unique identifier for Order as assigned by the exchange. It is unique per broker firm, per instrument, per trading date.

field.name: mDEntryPositionNo
field.description: Display position of a bid or offer, numbered from most competitive to least competitive, per market side, beginning with 1.

field.name: mDEntryType
field.description: Entry Type (BID or OFFER)

field.name: mDUpdateAction
field.description: Update Action (DELETE, DELETE_FROM, DELETE_THRU)

field.name: matchEventIndicator
field.description: Identifies if it is a retransmission

sbe:message.name: IncrementalRefresh_Trade_MBO_53
sbe:message.description: Relays trade information on one instrument

field.name: mDEntryType
field.description: Entry type: Trade

field.name: applVerID
field.description: Specifies the service pack release being applied at message level

field.name: securityID
field.description: Security ID as defined by B3. For the SecurityID list, see the Security Definition message in Market Data feed.

field.name: securityIDSource
field.description: Security ID Source

field.name: securityExchange
field.description: Market to which the symbol belongs

field.name: mDEntryTimestamp
field.description: Date and Time of Market Data Entry

field.name: mDInsertTimestamp
field.description: The date and time when the order was inserted or re-inserted into the order book or manually altered by MktOps.

field.name: mDEntryPx
field.description: Price of the Market Data Entry.

field.name: mDEntrySize
field.description: Quantity or volume represented by the Market Data Entry

field.name: tradeID
field.description: Contains the unique identifier for this trade per instrument + trading date, as assigned by the exchange. Required if reporting a Trade.

field.name: mDEntryBuyer
field.description: For reporting trades (buying party)

field.name: mDEntrySeller
field.description: For reporting trades (selling party)

field.name: mDUpdateAction
field.description: Update Action (NEW or DELETE)

field.name: mDStreamID
field.description: The identifier or name of market data stream.

field.name: tradingSessionID
field.description: Identifier for trading session

field.name: matchEventIndicator
field.description: Identifies the end of the current event

field.name: tradeCondition
field.description: Set of conditions describing a trade

field.name: tradeDate
field.description: Used to specify the trading date for which a set of market data applies. If absent, use the current day (expressed in local time at place of trade)

field.name: tradeVolume
field.description: Total traded volume for the session.

field.name: vwapPx
field.description: Volume-weighted average price

field.name: mDEntryInterestRate
field.description: Interest Rate of the Termo Trade. Expressed in decimal form. For example, 1% points is expressed and sent as 0.01. One basis point is represented as 0.0001.

field.name: netChgPrevDay
field.description: Net change from previous trading day’s closing price vs. last traded price.

field.name: sellerDays
field.description: Specifies the number of days that may elapse before delivery of the security. Only used for trades in forward market.

field.name: orderID
field.description: Unique identifier for Order as assigned by the exchange. It is unique per broker firm, per instrument, per trading date.

field.name: mDEntryPx
field.description: Price per share or contract. Conditionally required if the order type requires a price (not market orders and RLP)

field.name: mDEntrySize
field.description: Displayed quantity or volume represented by the Market Data Entry

field.name: mDEntryPositionNo
field.description: Display position of a bid or offer, numbered from most competitive to least competitive, per market side, beginning with 1.
